categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: A Rebel Base on Naboo's moon of Rori was in operation during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Under the control of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, this Rebel Base was constructed a short distance north of the city of Restuss during the military buildup leading to the Battle of Restuss.
The Rebel Base near Restuss was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
